testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlESSInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.5.1 [Need to Share ESS Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send ESS Inventory Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.6.1.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N47R651_Send_ESS_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N47R651_Send_ESS_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R377_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R377_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R379_Controller_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R379_Controller_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Direction - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Version is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N47R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Lane Number - ESS is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R657_Lane_Number___ESS_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R657_Lane_Number___ESS_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Elevation is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R658_Device_Elevation_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R658_Device_Elevation_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Height is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R659_Device_Height_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R659_Device_Height_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R660_Device_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R660_Device_Type_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Operation Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R661_Device_Operation_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R661_Device_Operation_Type_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Mobility Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R662_Device_Mobility_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R662_Device_Mobility_Type_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N47R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N47R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 26 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 28 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 29 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlESSInventoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N47R651_Send_ESS_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 30 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 30.1 VERIFY that an ess-sensor-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.2 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item
Step 30.3 VERIFY that an ess-sensor-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.4 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.5 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.6 VERIFY that a device-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.7 VERIFY that a device-name data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.8 VERIFY that an eSSInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 30.9 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item
Step 30.10 VERIFY that an ess-sensor-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.11 IF TMDD_N47R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.11.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.12 IF TMDD_N47R377_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.12.1 VERIFY that a device-description data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.13 IF TMDD_N47R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.13.1 VERIFY that a device-control-type data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.14 IF TMDD_N47R379_Controller_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.14.1 VERIFY that a controller-description data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.15 IF TMDD_N47R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.15.1 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.16 IF TMDD_N47R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.16.1 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.17 IF TMDD_N47R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.17.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.18 IF TMDD_N47R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.18.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.19 IF TMDD_N47R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.19.1 VERIFY that a link-name data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.20 IF TMDD_N47R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.20.1 VERIFY that a link-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.21 IF TMDD_N47R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.21.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.22 IF TMDD_N47R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.22.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.23 IF TMDD_N47R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.23.1 VERIFY that a route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.24 IF TMDD_N47R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.24.1 VERIFY that a device-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.25 IF TMDD_N47R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.25.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.device-inventory-header.device-url

Step 30.25.2 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header.device-url
Step 30.26 IF TMDD_N47R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.26.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor.ess-sensor-inventory-header
Step 30.27 IF TMDD_N47R657_Lane_Number___ESS_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.27.1 VERIFY that a lane-number data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.28 IF TMDD_N47R658_Device_Elevation_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.28.1 VERIFY that a sensor-location-elevation data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.29 IF TMDD_N47R659_Device_Height_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.29.1 VERIFY that a sensor-location-height data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.30 IF TMDD_N47R660_Device_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.30.1 VERIFY that a sensor-type data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.31 IF TMDD_N47R661_Device_Operation_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.31.1 VERIFY that a sensor-operation-type data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.32 IF TMDD_N47R662_Device_Mobility_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.32.1 VERIFY that a sensor-mobility-type data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSInventoryMsg.ess-inventory-item.ess-inventory-list.ess-sensor
Step 30.33 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 31 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 31.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 31.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 31.7 IF TMDD_N47R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 32 EXIT
